title.rendered: Insight Analytics: Creating, Storing, and Distributing Insights with UVA 2019

content.rendered: View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: The University of Virginia team has developed several insights around single issues that could be extremely useful to Career Centers. These insights are not useful unless they are made known to the users who need them, and are used to help drive decisions. Join this session for a walk through of how to set up valuable insights reports.
